title.narrative: Rural Development: Poverty Reduction Project in Aftout South and Karakoro - Phase II

description.narrative: The PASK II's goal is to improve the incomes and living conditions of the targeted populations. Its specific objective is to contribute to the building, in the Project area, of an economic and social fabric, based on the valorisation of natural resources which is sustainable and inclusive of poor rural households, in particular women and youth, through: (i ) soil and water conservation; (ii) the creation of sustainable and efficient agriculture, livestock and NRM systems; (iii) the setting up of a 'local partnership having a poverty reduction objective and where the targeted populations will fully intervene.Policy and institutional objectives: The Project will engage in policy dialogue with the concerned national institutions and a knowledge sharing relationship the decentralized structures. It will also support rural organizations to articulate needs with the local administration and allow better integration in legal and statutory frameworks as well as in the national policies

name.narrative: Rural Development: Poverty Reduction Project in Aftout South and Karakoro - Phase II

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
